metadata.description: Spells that damage, destroy, or remove aspects of mind, memory, and consciousness

spells.name: Forget the Day's Events
spells.description: This spell erases all memories of the past day from the target's mind. They retain their identity and skills but cannot remember anything that happened in the last 24 hours. The memories are permanently destroyed, not merely hidden.

spells.name: Dull the Scholar's Mind
spells.description: This spell temporarily reduces the target's Intelligence by 3 points, making them slow-witted and unable to perform complex mental tasks. They have difficulty with reasoning, memory recall, and learning new information while affected.

spells.name: Destroy the Secret Knowledge
spells.description: This spell selectively destroys specific knowledge or memories from the target's mind. The caster can erase knowledge of a particular subject, skill, or set of related memories. The target retains all other memories and abilities.

spells.name: Scatter the Concentrated Thought
spells.description: This spell destroys the target's ability to maintain concentration, making it impossible to focus on complex tasks or maintain spells requiring concentration. Any concentration-based effects the target is maintaining immediately end.

spells.name: Madness of the Broken Mind
spells.description: This devastating spell destroys portions of the target's sanity and reasoning ability, inducing permanent madness. The victim suffers from delusions, paranoia, and irrational behavior. They gain a Personality Trait of 'Mad +3' and lose the ability to think clearly about certain subjects.

spells.name: Erase the Beloved's Face
spells.description: This cruel spell destroys all memories of a specific person from the target's mind. The victim cannot remember the designated individual at all - their face, name, relationship, or any interactions become completely erased from memory.

spells.name: Silence the Inner Voice
spells.description: This spell destroys the target's internal monologue and ability to think in words. They can still reason and feel emotions, but cannot form thoughts into language or plan using verbal thinking. This makes spellcasting and complex reasoning extremely difficult.

spells.name: Destroy the Learned Skill
spells.description: This spell permanently destroys a specific skill or ability from the target's mind. They lose all knowledge and muscle memory related to that skill, as if they had never learned it. Years of training can be undone in an instant.

spells.name: Shatter the Will to Live
spells.description: This terrible spell destroys the target's will to continue living, inducing profound despair and hopelessness. The victim becomes suicidal and will actively seek death unless constantly watched. Only the strongest personalities can resist the urge to end their own existence.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (destroy will to live), +2 Voice, +3 Moon

spells.name: Blank the Empty Slate
spells.description: This ultimate spell destroys virtually all memories and learned behaviors from the target's mind, leaving them as a blank slate. They retain basic motor functions and survival instincts but must relearn language, skills, and even personal relationships from scratch.

spells.name: Destroy the Magical Understanding
spells.description: This spell specifically destroys a person's understanding of magic, erasing their knowledge of Arts, spells, and magical theory. A magus affected by this spell loses significant portions of their magical education and may be unable to cast familiar spells.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (destroy magical knowledge), +2 Voice, +1 Vim requisite

spells.name: Curse of Eternal Confusion
spells.description: This curse destroys the target's ability to form new memories or learn new information for an entire year. They become stuck in their current mental state, unable to adapt to changing circumstances or remember recent events for more than a few minutes.
